description: A casual short that holds it down around town but can still rally for redpoint attempts and weekends at camp, the J Tree™ Belted Short has both durability and aesthetics worthy of its namesake. The durable cotton ripstop fabric withstands days in the desert and obligatory off-widths, while the articulated fit and gusseted construction allow full range of motion for sunset scrambles.
name: Mountain Hardwear J Tree Belted Shorts, 9" Inseam - Mens
